Wanted to say thanks, especially when I know how it feels when no one appreciates our uploads, as my torrent, has uploaded over 100GB, and no seeders left anyway, everyone left immediately after they finished, and no one even bothered to say Thank you .. (thinking of stop seeding it soon, if it will not change..)

Just because it is "free"  you do not need to be rude and such douches, especially to those of us who give up our free time and put effort in to give you these things for free!
So thank you!

Hope this can get more people to understand that just a little THANK YOU! can make a big difference .. so not any more great groups like seacret_myth and 3Li will leave!!

Best regards!
